data.text: @lajulman @Magicfetus3 @DailyMonitor Did u get me? Crossing the borders is a life to some! Not leisure and now u are telling them to stay home which means even if they can lose it,u don't care! So sad what if we discuss to see how they can lowdown that price? Any inconvenience to u????
@DailyMonitor Alina ne ekyapa kyetakalye e Kiboga.
@lajulman @SempiraKasozi @DailyMonitor Don't coz me problems 😂. I'm still virgin 🤠
@Davidok79076761 @DailyMonitor Non physical barriers still in place. The nephew didn't negotiate very well. He was hurrying to get to Twitter!

@wisemanbmd @Magicfetus3 @DailyMonitor But if you don't have the money and the reason for traveling is not an emergency just stay home until it affordable and convenient. Loitering is not a nice practice.
@NKOTANYIFranci2 @DailyMonitor There is even a new mall coming up at the former wandegeya chicken spot..probably it may carry another KFC branch 😂😂😂
@NKOTANYIFranci2 @DailyMonitor While you were away, wandegeya chicken no longer exists.. Mr Hudu boss sent them back to the village. But you are welcome bro since borders swung wide open
